title: National Order of Chad
text: The National Order of Chad is the preeminent <a href="Order%20%28honour%29">order of merit</a> of the <a href="Republic%20of%20Chad">Republic of Chad</a>. It is also featured on the <a href="Coat%20of%20arms%20of%20Chad">Coat of arms of Chad</a>. The Grand Master of the order is the <a href="President%20of%20Chad">President of Chad</a>.
